dcterms:description: SNIPS consists of user utterances for 7 intent classes such as GetWeather, RateBook, etc. Since this dataset itself does not include OOD utterances, we follow the procedure described in [32] to synthetically create OOD examples.
dcterms:title: SNIPS

dcterms:creator: V. Gangal
A. Arora
A. Einolghozati
S. Gupta
dcterms:description: ROSTD starts from the English part of multilingual dialog dataset released by [33] as ID utterances and later gets extended by [14] with OOD utterances.
dcterms:title: ROSTD

dcterms:creator: J. Xu
B. Xu
P. Wang
S. Zheng
G. Tian
J. Zhao
dcterms:description: Stackoverflow is a subset of the challenge data published by Kaggle, where question titles associated with 20 different categories are selected. We follow the same way as SNIPS to create OOD samples.
dcterms:title: Stackoverflow

dcterms:creator: X.-H. Phan
L.-M. Nguyen
S. Horiguchi
dcterms:description: Searchsnippets is extracted from web search snippets, which contains search snippets associated with 8 different topics. We randomly selected 2 out of 8 classes as OOD classes while using the remaining classes as ID classes.
dcterms:title: Searchsnippets
